name: consul-service-registrator
description: Set of classes for service registration in Consul

scripts.test:coverage: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha  --print both -- --opts tests/mocha.opts -R spec ./tests/Unit
scripts.coveralls: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --opts tests/mocha.opts -R spec ./tests/Unit && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Dmitry Menshikov <d.menshikov@gmail.com>
